page.title: 06 ARNEWOOD SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Many people swim at the indoor heated swimming pool at Arnewood. Lots more people go there for the other facilities: mothers take their young children for tiny tots' recreation on Mondays and many people go there for squash. There is a gymnastics club and also a trampolining course held for young people. This year the sports centre has given out many certificates to children and adults who have taken swimming courses and swum so many metres. On certain days at different times the pool is only open to disabled people. For those who can not enter the water on their own there is a hoist to lift them in and out. This year the Manager is Dave Jenkins and his Assistant Managers are Val Workman and Rosemary Bartlett. By Kerry Pearce, Philippa Thompson and Victoria Coubro.
